effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,679 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a high chance to summon a scarab that retrieves a fortifying chunk of flesh from your target. Scarabs deal 9,603 Physical damage and reduce your damage taken by 50% until 240,006 damage has been prevented.
Use: Send your swarm into a frenzy, summoning 12 scarabs over 3 sec to ravage your foes. The number of scarabs is increased by your Haste. (1 Min Cooldown)

name_description.display_string: The War Within Season 1 Raid Finder

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
